description:
go-tour: trim spaces around source code before displaying

Changes to the way code is generated add some space around the
code snippets, which can be quite ugly. This fixes that issue.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=e06d779edc4d ***

go-tour: trim spaces around source code before displaying

Changes to the way code is generated add some space around the
code snippets, which can be quite ugly. This fixes that issue.

R=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev
